org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.attachment
Interface IAeAttachmentStorage

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeCompositeAttachmentStorage, AeFileAttachmentStorage, AePersistentAttachmentStorage
public interface IAeAttachmentStorage

Attachment storage interface.

Method Summary
 void associateProcess(long aGroupId, long aProcessId)
          Associates the attachments in the given group with the given process.
 void cleanup()
          Cleans up unassociated attachments.

          Creates a new attachment group and returns its id.

 java.util.Map getHeaders(long aAttachmentId)
          Returns an attachment's headers.
 void removeAttachment(long aAttachmentId)
          Removes an attachment.
 long storeAttachment(long aGroupId, java.io.InputStream aInputStream, java.util.Map aHeaders)
          Stores an attachment (headers and content) and returns the attachment id.

cleanup

public void cleanup()
             throws AeBusinessProcessException
Cleans up unassociated attachments.

This can only be done at engine startup.

TODO (JB) add timestamp to support online cleanup by date
